Text.Page:
So many of our soldiers have fallen to the Gutrends—many of them my friends—and still the Gutrends keep coming.

The two that plague us the worst are the {@LinkCreature:6#1041#Gutrend kulkaris} and {@LinkCreature:6#1051#clawtamers}. Go thin out their numbers.

It will not only help us out, but will give me vengence for those who have fallen.
I like what you've done out there. I'll fight the ones that remain—it should be fairly low-maintenance from here.
